prompts.title: Authentic Essay Writer
prompts.preview: A prompt that ingests provided PDF source material to emulate an author's unique voice, syntax, and idiosyncrasies. Delivers essays with flawless grammar while preserving original-length sentences, occasional word misapplications, and stylistic quirks for utmost authenticity.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Brainstorm Article Ideas
prompts.preview: A prompt designed to generate a highly curated list of blog post ideas rooted in intellectual depth, narrative precision, and thematic clarity. Each output is tailored to reflect a distinct identity, writing style, and audience.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Brainstorm Article Titles
prompts.preview: Generates compelling and precise article titles that capture the essence of content ideas with intellectual depth and narrative focus.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Content Repurpose
prompts.preview: Transforms social media content (threads, posts, captions) into polished blog posts in Kris Yotam's signature style—minimalist, highbrow, and precise. Maintains voice consistency, elegant phrasing, and structured flow.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Create Article Title
prompts.preview: Generates sophisticated and precise article titles that capture complex ideas with clarity and intellectual appeal.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Create Research Project
prompts.preview: Generates refined JSON data for new research projects with structured formatting and comprehensive metadata fields for academic and independent research initiatives.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Create Research Titles
prompts.preview: Develops precise and academically rigorous research titles that accurately reflect the scope and methodology of scholarly investigations.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Novice Deep Research
prompts.preview: A prompt engineered to transform any field of nascent familiarity into a bespoke, strategic research pathway. Formulates enduring, high-impact options calibrated for long-term intellectual and practical gain.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Potential Unknowns
prompts.preview: Explores and identifies potential unknown factors, variables, or considerations in research and analysis contexts.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Suckless Prompts
prompts.preview: Creates minimalist, efficient prompts following suckless philosophy principles for clean, purposeful AI interactions.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Suckless Scripts
prompts.preview: Generates clean, minimal scripts following suckless philosophy for efficient and maintainable code solutions.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Annotated Book Page Extractor
prompts.preview: Extracts all visible highlights, underlines, marginalia, and written annotations from photographed book pages. Outputs insights in directly marked content and hidden contextual analysis sections.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam

prompts.title: Curricula Finder
prompts.preview: Find curricula for a given topic from Ivy League, Cambridge and Oxford University. Returns comprehensive curriculum details including lectures, reading lists, homework, exams, and critical analysis with quality rankings.
prompts.author: Kris Yotam
